product_name: Hart 1-Day First Aid Kit - Special Buy
long_description: The Hart 1-Day first aid kit offers essential medical supplies for up to 2 people going on a day hike. Kit includes: three 3.75 x 3 in. bandages, four 1 x 3 in. bandages, one 2 x 4.5 in. bandages, 1 fingertip, 1 knuckle and 2 butterfly closures. Also includes: three 2 x 2 in. gauze pads, one 2 in. x 4.1 yds. gauze roll, 1 triple antibiotic ointment packet, 3 antiseptic wound wipes and 2 bite/sting relief wipes. The Hart 1-Day first aid kit also includes a quick guide. Special buy.
short_description: The Hart 1-Day first aid kit offers essential medical supplies for up to 2 people going on a day hike.
